props.name: collapsed
props.description: The initial state of the stack

props.name: buttonProps
props.description: Props passed to the 'show less' button

props.name: onCollapseWillChange
props.description: A callback for collapse state will change (value is future collapsed state)

props.name: onCollapseChanged
props.description: A callback for collapse state change (value is collapsed state)

props.name: disablePresses
props.description: A setting that disables pressability on cards
